name: Ascending Madness
description: Ascending Madness is a hardcore, psychedelic, twin-stick shooter. Destroy waves of monstrosities in a colorful, gritty world while jamming to psychedelic rock music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel (R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.5GHz 2.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
